meanings.sent1: The hardworking irrigators watered the crops every morning.
meanings.sent2: The farmers relied on the irrigators to keep their fields hydrated.
meanings.sent3: The irrigators had a race to see who could water the most plants in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The irrigators were like human rain, bringing life to the dry soil.
meanings.sent5: The diligent irrigators never missed a day of watering the farmland.

meanings.definition: A device used for irrigating land.
meanings.sent1: The modern irrigators efficiently distributed water across the field.
meanings.sent2: The old-fashioned irrigators required manual operation to function.
meanings.sent3: The irrigators decided to take a break and have a chat about the weather.
meanings.sent4: The irrigators hummed softly as they sprayed water onto the thirsty plants.
meanings.sent5: The high-tech irrigators resembled dancing fountains as they sprayed water around.
